title: Snail Mail (exe) only-full game
description:
Snail Mail 

Speedy Delivery! Guide Turbo the Snail through the furthest reaches of the universe to deliver Intergalactic Mail in this fast-paced racing game. But watch out for the evil slugs! Play through all 50 levels in Postal Mode, test your reflexes in Challenge Mode, and get the fastest time in Time Trials.

  System Requirements:  
 
 
 OS: Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Me, Windows NT Memory: 128MB DirectX: 9.0 Display: 3D Video Card CPU: P400 

 
1. Install the game and play


If you are running Windows Vista, to play game after you\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;ve installded it, you must right click on shortcut or exe. and run as administrator
